<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/fe36afd11413ef41257d1c3cb8c0bfcd/tumblr_inline_nc1ys4egEs1rr2wit.png"/></p>

<p>We are pleased to announce the reaching of a new milestone in the development of KSP update 0.25. Experimentals!<br/><br/>Tests are being made and things are being tightened up in this final phase before release. Keep an eye out on Tumblr and all of our other official channels for further news. <br/><br/>Thanks to xtoro for the pic.</p>

Oh my god!

about a week and the update is out!!!

Source: the article about the QA and the experimental phases told that the experimental phase last about a week.
All aboard the Hypeplane!
YAY! Lets get ready to hype...

At this stage, we can't get ready to hype: getting ready to do something implies that we haven't done that something(please forgive for my awful syntaxe, english isn't my natural language).

And, we are already hyped.

there is no adjective that could describe how much we're hyped.

Oh my god!

about a week and the update is out!!!

Source: the article about the QA and the experimental phases told that the experimental phase last about a week.

Eh, usually two weeks, except .24 got delayed entirely after the first expirementals. So don't get too excited.

Eh, usually two weeks, except .24 got delayed entirely after the first expirementals. So don't get too excited.

I agree, it got delayed by a month or so.
#HYPETRAIN everyone All aboard! full steam ahead!!!!

Well, that was certainly quick! It's nice to see that KSP's development pace is kicking it up a notch. Things seemed a bit slow between 0.23 and 0.24, though I'm guessing there was a good reason for that. (Besides ARM, obviously.)
thios is a new record for it. now to give load of money to the devs so Microsoft dosent buy them. or google
Aw, hell...I only started playing 0.24 only a couple of weeks ago..........
Fantastic! KSP 0.25 enters experimentals AND Noct reaches its funding goal on Kickstarter, all in one day! This is gonna be great!
The hype train is speeding up

Gregroxmun, is the HypeTrain fueled yet? Coaches coupled?

We're gonna need it soon.

Gregroxmun, is the HypeTrain fueled yet? Coaches coupled?

We're gonna need it soon.

We're already going full speed! get on

We're already going full speed! get on

What?!

*Can't fly fast enough to get on"

I'll catch up around the next beeeennnd....

Well, 0.23~0.24 damn slow.

0.24~0.25 a bit fast.

Well, 0.23~0.24 damn slow.

0.24~0.25 a bit fast.

I believe that since 0.25 is using pre-built spaceplane parts instead of the developers having to create entirely new ones, it is being released a lot faster than it otherwise would have. I also think 0.26 will take a bit longer because the devs have said they have a massive game-changing feature they want to implement for 0.26. I don't have the exact link, but they mentioned it in one of the Kerbalcast episodes.

Edited September 19, 2014 by Andrew Hansen
These are really good news

The hype train is out of fuel

#HYPE

so Microsoft dosent buy them. or google

Ugh I hope that never happens. Buyouts always seem to ruin things. Just open up merchandising or something when you need funds. Can't even get the kerbaliser app atm because it's not available in the UK.
The hype-train will roll off the track in the next corner if this speed continues! We need to get Densel Washington to slow it!!!
Choooo-Choooo!
Great job... can't wait

The hype train is out of fuel

#HYPE

No it isn't, it's continuing at full speed.
